text: Claudio Baggini (1 August 1936 - 25 September 2015) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. Baggini was born in Rome. He was became a priest on 14 June 1959. He served as the Bishop of Vigevano from 18 March 2000, until 12 March 2011. He resigned. Baggini died on 25 September 2015, in Lodi at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:People from Rome Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Claudio Baggini
